title: Spy Novel London
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about fun apps and games like the "what if?" game, Dungeons and Dragons charisma, voting rights, and more!

Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave us a voice message at seakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
